Series.Actors: |Alexandre Astier|Lionel Astier|Thomas Cousseau|Franck Pitiot|Jean-Robert Lombard|Anne Girouard|Joëlle Sévilla|Vanessa Guedj|Serge Papagalli|Josée Drevon|Bruno Fontaine|Jean-Christophe Hembert|Nicolas Gabion|Audrey Fleurot|Jacques Chambon|Carlo Brandt|Simon Astier|
Series.Overview: In this off beat account of King Arthur's quest for the Grail, virtually every journey, battle or adventure is stopped dead in its tracks by the knights of the round table's most worldly traits : cowardice, greed, idiocy or misplaced chivalry. As a consequence, instead of epic adventures we are treated with the characters' pragmatic and anachronistic take on each and every event in the Grail legend, true to the purest sitcom tradition
